doc.title: Trouble No More: The Making of a John Mellencamp Album
doc.plot: Trouble No More: The Making of a John Mellencamp Album is an hour-long video. Produced by students at Indiana University, the film documents the making of Mellencamp's first covers album, Trouble No More, released in summer of 2003. Includes behind-the-scenes rehearsals, in-studio recording sessions, and live performances.
